column2: "Hey, you made it back in one piece, huh? Your report checks out, so I'd say everything went just fine."
"If you keep wielding that partizan like that, you won't have anything to worry about."
"Oh, and go ahead and keep it. It's all yours."
"Well, see you around, pal. Keep practicing with that partizan."
"You can now invite Ohza to join you as a partner."
"Joseph has issued a client order.  You can find him in the upper gate area."
